93  SliderJointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2,
94  const Vector3& initAnchorPointWorldSpace,

96  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::SLIDERJOINT),

120  isLimitEnabled(true), isMotorEnabled(false),
121  minTranslationLimit(initMinTranslationLimit),

224 // Class SliderJoint
230 class SliderJoint : public Joint {
231 
232  private :

237  static const decimal BETA;
238 
239  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
240 
241  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //

244  void resetLimits();

247  virtual size_t getSizeInBytes() const override;
248 
249  public :
250 
251  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
252 
254  SliderJoint(Entity entity, PhysicsWorld& world, const SliderJointInfo& jointInfo);
255 
257  virtual ~SliderJoint() override = default;
258 
260  SliderJoint(const SliderJoint& constraint) = delete;

264 
266  bool isLimitEnabled() const;
267 
269  bool isMotorEnabled() const;

296  void setMotorSpeed(decimal motorSpeed);
297 
299  decimal getMaxMotorForce() const;
300 
302  void setMaxMotorForce(decimal maxMotorForce);
303 
305  decimal getMotorForce(decimal timeStep) const;
306 
308  virtual Vector3 getReactionForce(decimal timeStep) const override;
309 
311  virtual Vector3 getReactionTorque(decimal timeStep) const override;
312 
314  virtual std::string to_string() const override;
315 };
316 
317 // Return the number of bytes used by the joint
318 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE size_t SliderJoint::getSizeInBytes() const {
319  return sizeof(SliderJoint);
320 }
